The message claiming the launch of a new: smart' passport in India was widely circulated on social media platforms like Facebook, Twitter, and WhatsApp.
Alt News: a fact-checking organization, received queries on WhatsApp regarding the authenticity of the smart passport claim.
Alt News conducted a reverse image searc: The Passport - Concept" on Medium. The article was written by Siddhant Gupta, an engineer and designer, who created a concept design for a passport card resembling a pocket-sized ATM card.
